name: How Air Canada is Handling COVID-19 Travel
description:
Last week, I had the pleasure of being invited by Air Canada on a special flight to check out their end-to-end CleanCare+ program.

We flew to Vancouver and back on the Airbus A220, for a day trip full of presentations and experiencing AC's new way of doing things.

It was an honour to be invited, and I'm very thankful for the opportunity!

DISCLAIMER: This flight was provided free of charge by Air Canada. This video was not pre-approved by Air Canada and all opinions are my own.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Air Canada (ACA/AC)
Aircraft: Airbus Canada A220-300 (BCS3)
Flight Number: AC2202/2203
Seat: 25F/12F
Livery: New (2017)
Engines: 2x Pratt and Whitney PW1500G Series 
Registration: C-GJXW
Route: Calgary (YYC) - Vancouver (YVR) - Calgary (YYC)
Callsign: AIR CANADA 2202 / 2203
Runway used: 35R (YYC) - 26R/26L (YVR) - 17R (YYC)
Date filmed: October 14th, 2020
